prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Pipe, Strings, Brass, Guitar, Piano, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Pipe, Strings, Brass, Guitar, Piano, Bass - this song has it all, but no Drums.

Style 2: This composition features Reed, Pipe, Strings, Brass, Guitar, Piano, and Bass - but no Drums.

Style 3: No Drums, but this song still has Reed, Pipe, Strings, Brass, Guitar, Piano, and Bass.
